about_the_game:
Last Life is a breathtaking adventure game set in NeoNova, a cyberpunk city where high technology and dark secrets intertwine. Our protagonist, a cute cat controlled by players, will embark on a mysterious journey to find their lost lover.



In the game, our cat and their lover live in an artificial experimental forest. However, one day, their lover suddenly disappears, and our cat steps out of the experimental forest and enters NeoNova. This dazzling city, filled with neon lights, is full of mysterious inhabitants, dangerous areas, and intricate puzzles.

The cat's mission is to navigate the complex streets of NeoNova, find the traces of their lover, and rescue them. Along the way, you will encounter different characters, collect clues, and explore different areas of the city. Solve puzzles, overcome challenges, and progress deeper into the depths of the story by interacting with other objects and creatures.



Last Life: NeoNova offers an impressive adventure filled with an immersive graphic style, an exciting story, and easy gameplay mechanics. Uncover secrets, reveal dark pasts, and showcase the courage and wit within your cat.

Are you ready? Last Life awaits you!
